participant_1.background:
I am a savage.
I am stuck in the past due to remotness.
I have no technological skills.
I love the outdoors.
I work for the discovery channel creating videos.

participant_2.background:
I am a volunteer firefighter.
I have a college degree in marketing.
I am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
I am still living at home at age 30.
I am colorblind.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I work for the Discovery Channel creating videos.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I'm a volunteer firefighter and I have a college degree in marketing.
That's cool! I love the outdoors. I'm a bit of a savage, I guess you could say.
I like the outdoors too, but I'm not sure I'm as much of a savage as you are.
I'm not sure what you mean.
Well, you said you're stuck in the past due to remoteness. That makes me think you don't have a lot of technological skills.
Oh, yeah, I guess I'm not the most tech-savvy person. But I'm working on it!
That's good to hear. I'm colorblind, so I have to rely on technology a lot.
It can be, but it's not too bad. I've learned to adapt.
Well, I'm glad you're able to make the best of it.
Thanks. So, what are you working on for the Discovery Channel?
I'm working on a new series about the history of the American West.
That sounds really cool! I love the American West.
Me too! I'm excited to see how it turns out.
Me too! I'll be sure to watch it when it comes out.
